name: Intermediate Clean
description: Mid-level cleaning phase focusing on detailed cleaning and preparation for final stages

template.title: Intermediate Clean - Detailed Cleaning Phase
template.description: Second phase of cleaning focusing on detailed work, sanitization, and preparing surfaces for final finishing touches.

tasks.name: Surface Sanitization
tasks.notes: Sanitize all surfaces, door handles, light switches, and high-touch areas

tasks.name: Floor Deep Cleaning & Treatment
tasks.notes: Deep clean floors, apply treatments, prepare for final waxing/sealing

tasks.name: Window Glass Cleaning
tasks.notes: Clean all window glass, mirrors, and glass surfaces for streak-free finish

tasks.name: Fixture & Hardware Polishing
tasks.notes: Polish light fixtures, door hardware, faucets, and metal surfaces

tasks.name: Carpet Spot Treatment
tasks.notes: Treat remaining stains, high-traffic areas, and prepare for final cleaning

tasks.name: Air Vent & Filter Cleaning
tasks.notes: Clean air vents, replace filters, improve air quality

tasks.name: Quality Check & Touch-ups
tasks.notes: Inspect work quality, perform necessary touch-ups before final phase
